text: I think cats are way better than dogs. They're so independent and chill.
name: Purrfect Pete

text: No way! Dogs are loyal and playful. Cats are just lazy.
name: Barking Ben

text: Actually, I like both, but rabbits are my favorite. They're so fluffy!
name: Bunny Bella

text: See? Cats are too aloof. Dogs are always happy to see you.
name: Wagging Wanda

text: That's because you haven't met the right cat. My cat loves cuddles.
name: Meowly Molly

text: Cuddles? My dog plays fetch and does tricks! That's way more fun.
name: Fetch Fiona

text: What about hamsters? They are so small and cute!
name: Hammy Harry

text: Yeah, but cats are graceful and elegant. Dogs just slobber.
name: Silky Sarah

text: Slobber? That's just love! Dogs show their affection.
name: Licky Lucy

text: I'm more of a bird person. Parrots can talk!
name: Squawk Sam
